attributes.action: abolish all forms of double taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
once you have paid tax _once_, that should be the end of the matter.
You pay tax on your income, yet I see calls for taxing people again if they dare to spend anything of what is left from the first time around.
You should be encouraging people to improve themselves rather than dragging them down to some unspecified lowest common denominator.
